channel.title: Maven on On Code & Design
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on On Code & Design

item.title: Testing Web Services from JUnit using SoapUI
item.description: There is no doubt that SoapUI is a superb tool for testing Web Services. Yet, some people seem to think that SoapUI is just used for manual testing. In addition to manual tests, SoapUI supports automated tests, that is, test suites. Test suites are a step in the right direction towards automation but running them still requires human intervention. In other words, the user still has to launch SoapUI and click on the “Run…” button.
